entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
